title: github
text:
generate_github

 generate_github (project_directory:str='.', template_directory:str='.')

Write a .github directory for the project.




Type
Default
Details




project_directory
str
.
Where to create the .github folder.


template_directory
str
.
Where to get template files from


Returns
None

title: devcontainer
text:
generate_devcontainer

 generate_devcontainer (project_name:str, package:bool=False,
                        gpu:bool=False, project_directory:str='.',
                        template_directory:str='.')

Write a .devcontainer directory for the project.










Type
Default
Details




project_name
str

The slug for the project. Should be the same as the GitHub repo.


package
bool
False
Whether this is for a Python package


gpu
bool
False
Whether to make the GPU available


project_directory
str
.
Where to create the .devcontainer directory. Defaults to working directory.


template_directory
str
.
Where the template directory is located. Defaults to working directory.


Returns
None

title: dockerfile
text:
generate_dockerfile

 generate_dockerfile (gpu:bool=False, deepstream:bool=False,
                      project_directory:str='.',
                      template_directory:str='.')

Write a Dockerfile the project.










Type
Default
Details




gpu
bool
False
Whether to make the GPU available


deepstream
bool
False
Whether to set up project for DeepStream


project_directory
str
.
Where to create the dockerfile. Defaults to working directory.


template_directory
str
.
Where to create the .devcontainer folder. Defaults to working directory.


Returns
None
